home.home-description: What if I told you that you can manage consumption of water in your company more efficiently, using measurement technology and innovation.
home.buildings-description: Our innovative technology assist businesses to become more efficient in their water management.
home.water-meter-web-app-description: Our management tools provide our customers with real-time data visualization through our interactive web platform, which shows real-time water consumption through accurate records and graphics.
home.water-meter-mobile-app-description: It provides real-time information on the go! Our clients have access to their water consumption records, daily, weekly and monthly.
home.note: Note: Water Meter Web App and Water Meter Mobile App are currently under development.

solutions.solutions-description: With Water Meter, visualize graphs and statistics in an efficient way, and the water consumption through alert notifications in real time.
solutions.data-analysis-description: Water measurement consumption details and billing charges will be provided to our clients.
solutions.save-money-description: Our clients save money in the short and long term by using our technology.
solutions.saving-environment-description: Our company is focus on saving the environment one drop of water at a time.
solutions.alert-notifications-description: Our notifications will inform our clients of the water consumption and will show a comparison between previous consumption records with current ones.

our-technology.our-technology-description: Our company is solving every building’s water waist problems through our real-time managing technology application. Our unique technology and algorithms provide our clients a peace of mind knowing that every drop of water its being monitor and accounted for.
our-technology.hardware-description: Our unique patented software works with high-capacity sensors and microcontrollers which provide real-time management information to our clients.
our-technology.software-description: Our patented software algorithms work together with our managing Web and Mobile application to give our clients real-time information about their buildings water usage.
our-technology.logic-description: Our powerful cloud administration infrastructure works with intelligently and connects our clients via Wi-Fi and provides a real-time experience accessing our platform.

contact-with-us.contact-with-us-description: To learn more about Water Meter or technical support, Contact us.
contact-with-us.contact-business-description: The Water Meter team seeks to provide a better service and to strengthen the relationship with its customers.
contact-with-us.contact-to-get-help-description: Our technical team is available to diagnose any problem that may arise and solve it as soon as possible.

our-company.our-company-description: From the lowest to the highest, to be a Salvadoran company that provides savings and water management solutions to our clients, expanding our services internationally.
